languages.text: "Каждый из нас ощущает связь с {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпом{/g} по-своему. Кто-то видит пятна и силуэты на периферии взгляда. Кто-то чувствует пальцы на хребте. Что до меня — у меня дверная щель в голове. Никак не прикрыть, сколько ни старайся, остается только привыкать к шепоту с той стороны. Когда надо для дела — прислушиваюсь получше, а обычно стараюсь не замечать".

traits.locale_text: "Каждый из нас ощущает связь с {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпом{/g} по-своему. Кто-то видит пятна и силуэты на периферии взгляда. Кто-то чувствует пальцы на хребте. Что до меня — у меня дверная щель в голове. Никак не прикрыть, сколько не старайся, остается только привыкать к шепоту с той стороны. Когда надо для дела — прислушиваюсь получше, а обычно стараюсь не замечать".

languages.text: "Every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} feels their connection with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} in their own way. One person might see spots and shadows out of the corner of their eye. Another feels fingers running down their spine. As for me, I've got a door in my head, one that's open just a crack. There's no way to close it, no matter how hard I try — I've just had to get used to the whispers from the other side. When I need to use it for work, I listen in more closely, but I usually just try not to notice it."
languages.original_text: "Каждый из нас ощущает связь с {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпом{/g} по-своему. Кто-то видит пятна и силуэты на периферии взгляда. Кто-то чувствует пальцы на хребте. Что до меня — у меня дверная щель в голове. Никак не прикрыть, сколько ни старайся, остается только привыкать к шепоту с той стороны. Когда надо для дела — прислушиваюсь получше, а обычно стараюсь не замечать".

traits.locale_text: "Every psyker feels their connection with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} in their own way. One person might see spots and shadows out of the corner of their eye. Another feels fingers running down their spine. As for me, I've got a door in my head, one that's open just a crack. There's no way to close it, no matter how hard I try — I've just had to get used to the whispers from the other side. When I need to use it for work, I listen in more closely, but I usually just try not to notice it."

languages.text: “每位{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}都与{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}有着独特的联系。有的人可以从眼角中看到亚空间的斑点与阴影，还有的人会感觉到亚空间的手指抚摸着他们的脊梁。至于我，我的脑子里有一扇门，只开了一条缝。无论我怎么努力，都关不上这扇门，我只能习惯来自另一边的低语。当我需要它为我服务时，我会更加仔细地去听，但绝大多数时间我都会试着忽视它。”
languages.original_text: "Every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} feels their connection with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} in their own way. One person might see spots and shadows out of the corner of their eye. Another feels fingers running down their spine. As for me, I've got a door in my head, one that's open just a crack. There's no way to close it, no matter how hard I try — I've just had to get used to the whispers from the other side. When I need to use it for work, I listen in more closely, but I usually just try not to notice it."

traits.locale_text: “每位{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}都与{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}有着独特的联系。有的人可以从眼角中看到亚空间的斑点与阴影，还有的人会感觉到亚空间的手指抚摸着他们的脊梁。至于我，我的脑子里有一扇门，只开了一条缝。无论我怎么努力，都关不上这扇门，我只能习惯来自另一边的低语。当我需要它为我服务时，我会更加仔细地去听，但绝大多数时间我都会试着忽视它。”

languages.original_text: "Every psyker feels their connection with the warp in their own way. One person might see spots and shadows out of the corner of their eye. Another feels fingers running down their spine. As for me, I've got a door in my head, one that's open just a crack. There's no way to close it, no matter how hard I try — I've just had to get used to the whispers from the other side. When I need to use it for work, I listen in more closely, but I usually just try not to notice it."

languages.text: «Todo {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} siente su conexión con la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} a su manera. Para una persona pueden ser puntos negros y sombras en el rabillo del ojo. Para otra pueden ser dedos tocando su espalda. En mi caso, tengo en la cabeza una puerta abierta una rendija. No hay forma de cerrarla, por más que lo intente, así que he tenido que acostumbrarme a los susurros del otro lado. Cuando tengo que usarlos para trabajar, escucho con más atención, pero normalmente intento no hacerles caso».
languages.original_text: "Every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} feels their connection with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} in their own way. One person might see spots and shadows out of the corner of their eye. Another feels fingers running down their spine. As for me, I've got a door in my head, one that's open just a crack. There's no way to close it, no matter how hard I try — I've just had to get used to the whispers from the other side. When I need to use it for work, I listen in more closely, but I usually just try not to notice it."

traits.locale_text: «Todo {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} siente su conexión con la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} a su manera. Para una persona pueden ser puntos negros y sombras en el rabillo del ojo. Para otra pueden ser dedos tocando su espalda. En mi caso, tengo en la cabeza una puerta abierta una rendija. No hay forma de cerrarla, por más que lo intente, así que he tenido que acostumbrarme a los susurros del otro lado. Cuando tengo que usarlos para trabajar, escucho con más atención, pero normalmente intento no hacerles caso».

languages.text: 「すべての{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}が、それぞれの方法で{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}とのつながりを感じているわ。ある人は目の端に斑点や影を見るかもしれない。またある人は背筋に指が走るのを感じる。私の場合、頭の中に扉があるの。ほんの僅かばかり開いていて、どんなにがんばっても閉められない扉がね。向こう側からのささやきに慣れるしかなかったわ。仕事で使う必要があるときは、もっと耳を澄ませるが、普段は気づかないようにしているの」
languages.original_text: "Every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} feels their connection with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} in their own way. One person might see spots and shadows out of the corner of their eye. Another feels fingers running down their spine. As for me, I've got a door in my head, one that's open just a crack. There's no way to close it, no matter how hard I try — I've just had to get used to the whispers from the other side. When I need to use it for work, I listen in more closely, but I usually just try not to notice it."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}が、それぞれの方法で{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}とのつながりを感じているわ。ある人は目の端に斑点や影を見るかもしれない。またある人は背筋に指が走るのを感じる。私の場合、頭の中に扉があるの。ほんの僅かばかり開いていて、どんなにがんばっても閉められない扉がね。向こう側からのささやきに慣れるしかなかったわ。仕事で使う必要があるときは、もっと耳を澄ませるが、普段は気づかないようにしているの」

languages.text: "Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} fühlt seine Verbindung zum {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} auf seine ganz eigene Weise. Einer sieht vielleicht aus dem Augenwinkel Flecken und Schatten. Ein anderer spürt Finger, die ihm das Rückgrat hinabkrabbeln. Was mich angeht: Ich habe eine Tür im Kopf, die nur einen winzigen Spalt geöffnet ist. Sie lässt sich nicht schließen, so sehr ich mich auch bemühe. Ich musste mich einfach an das Flüstern von der anderen Seite gewöhnen. Wenn ich es für meine Arbeit benötige, höre ich genauer ein, doch meist versuche ich einfach, es zu ignorieren."
languages.original_text: "Every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} feels their connection with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} in their own way. One person might see spots and shadows out of the corner of their eye. Another feels fingers running down their spine. As for me, I've got a door in my head, one that's open just a crack. There's no way to close it, no matter how hard I try — I've just had to get used to the whispers from the other side. When I need to use it for work, I listen in more closely, but I usually just try not to notice it."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} fühlt seine Verbindung zum {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} auf seine ganz eigene Weise. Einer sieht vielleicht aus dem Augenwinkel Flecken und Schatten. Ein anderer spürt Finger, die ihm das Rückgrat hinabkrabbeln. Was mich angeht: Ich habe eine Tür im Kopf, die nur einen winzigen Spalt geöffnet ist. Sie lässt sich nicht schließen, so sehr ich mich auch bemühe. Ich musste mich einfach an das Flüstern von der anderen Seite gewöhnen. Wenn ich es für meine Arbeit benötige, höre ich genauer ein, doch meist versuche ich einfach, es zu ignorieren."

languages.text: « Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} ressent différemment sa connexion au {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. Certains voient des taches et des ombres apparaître aux limites de leur champ de vision, d'autres sentent des doigts courir le long de leur colonne vertébrale. Pour ma part, j'ai dans ma tête une porte légèrement entrouverte. J'ai eu beau essayer, il est impossible de la fermer, alors j'ai dû m'habituer aux murmures qui viennent de l'autre côté. Quand mon travail l'exige, j'écoute plus attentivement, mais le reste du temps, je m'efforce de les ignorer. »
languages.original_text: "Every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} feels their connection with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} in their own way. One person might see spots and shadows out of the corner of their eye. Another feels fingers running down their spine. As for me, I've got a door in my head, one that's open just a crack. There's no way to close it, no matter how hard I try — I've just had to get used to the whispers from the other side. When I need to use it for work, I listen in more closely, but I usually just try not to notice it."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} ressent différemment sa connexion au {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. Certains voient des taches et des ombres apparaître aux limites de leur champ de vision, d'autres sentent des doigts courir le long de leur colonne vertébrale. Pour ma part, j'ai dans ma tête une porte légèrement entrouverte. J'ai eu beau essayer, il est impossible de la fermer, alors j'ai dû m'habituer aux murmures qui viennent de l'autre côté. Quand mon travail l'exige, j'écoute plus attentivement, mais le reste du temps, je m'efforce de les ignorer. »

languages.text: "Her {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyutla{/g} kendisine has bir bağlantı kurar. Birisi, göz ucuyla lekeler ve gölgeler görür. Bir diğeri, sırtından aşağı parmakların süzüldüğünü hisseder. Bana gelirsek benim zihnimde hafif aralık bir kapı var. Ne kadar uğraşırsam uğraşayım bir türlü kapatamıyorum. Öteki taraftan gelen fısıltılara alışmam gerekti. Onları iş için kullanmam gerektiğinde kulak kabartıyorum, çoğu zamansa yok saymaya çalışıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Every {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} feels their connection with the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} in their own way. One person might see spots and shadows out of the corner of their eye. Another feels fingers running down their spine. As for me, I've got a door in my head, one that's open just a crack. There's no way to close it, no matter how hard I try — I've just had to get used to the whispers from the other side. When I need to use it for work, I listen in more closely, but I usually just try not to notice it."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g}ler, kendilerine has bir {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} bağlantısı kurarlar. Bir tanesi, göz ucuyla lekeler ve gölgeler görür. Diğeri, sırtından aşağı parmakların süzüldüğünü hisseder. Bana gelirsek benim zihnimde hafif aralık bir kapı var. Ne kadar uğraşırsam uğraşayım onu kapatmamın bir yolu yok. Yalnızca öteki taraftan gelen fısıltılara alışmam gerekti. Bu fısıltılardan faydalanmak istediğimde onları daha dikkatli dinlerim ancak sıklıkla yok saymaya çalışırım."
